classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

disabled.description: If `true`, the button will be disabled.

disableFocusRipple.description:
If `true`, the  keyboard focus ripple will be disabled.
`disableRipple` must also be true.

disableRipple.description: If `true`, the ripple effect will be disabled.

selected.description: If `true`, the button will be rendered in an active state.

value.description:
The value to associate with the button when selected in a
ToggleButtonGroup.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.disabled: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `disabled={true}`.
descriptions.selected: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `selected={true}`.
descriptions.label: Styles applied to the `label` wrapper element.
descriptions.sizeSmall: Styles applied to the root element if `size="small"`.
descriptions.sizeLarge: Styles applied to the root element if `size="large"`.
